recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM OPINION AND ORDER re: 76 MOTION to Dismiss / NOTICE OF DEFENDANTS' MOTION TO DISMISS THE SECOND AMENDED COMPLAINT. filed by Ronen Faier, Lior Danziger, SolarEdge Technologies, Inc., JB Lowe, Zvi Lando. For the foregoing reasons, Defendants' motion to dismiss is GRANTED IN PART and DENIED IN PART. Plaintiffs have adequately stated claims for Section 10(b) and Section 20(a) liability with respect to the statements by the Individual Defendants that inventory levels in 2023 were low and that demand in Europe in 2023 was strong. Claims arising from the remaining statements are dismissed with leave to amend as described above. The Clerk of Court is directed to terminate the motion pending at Dkt. No. 76. SO ORDERED. (Signed by Judge Gregory H. Woods on 4/6/2025) (tg) (Entered: 04/07/2025)
